text: Mykyta Peterman (; born 12 June 1999) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who plays for FC Mariupol in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==Career== Peterman is a product of Berdyansk and Azovstal Mariupol youth sportive school systems. He made his début for FC Mariupol in the Ukrainian Premier League as a substituted player in the losing match against FC Shakhtar Donetsk on 26 May 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Berdyansk Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Mariupol players Category:FC Illichivets-2 Mariupol players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mykyta Peterman
